website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quality control problems, this DEF is a good choice for Ford owners.
pros: Made especially for Ford diesel-powered vehicles
Meets all required standards for treating NOx emissions in heavy duty diesel engines
Nozzle is designed to reduce messes and spills during application
cons: Some quality control issues reported including broken seals and missing nozzles

customer_reviews.title: the only Ford-recommended DEF
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the intended purpose, and is the only DEF that won't get you the stink-eye from the dealer if you have any warranty issues. Like "reductant pump pressure low" codes, for instance. You may want to check your local dealer to compare pricing before you pull the trigger on this.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: fresh
customer_reviews.text: Bought a bottle in early July 2020, bottle was filled June 2, 2020. Can't beat that freshness. Ordering another bottle now a month later, hoping it's similarly fresh!
customer_reviews.author: P. Reichert

customer_reviews.title: Ford OEM DEF
customer_reviews.text: Ford OEM DEF just like you get at the local ford dealer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, no spills and stopped when it was full!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time owning a diesel that requires the DEF fluid. After doing some research I thought it would be best to stay with the manufacturer DEF fluid to avoid and issues that I read about. I will say that this handy little tool worked great for me!
customer_reviews.author: DROIDX

customer_reviews.title: This container does not come with a nozzle as described
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the product buy I thought this came with a nozzle so it would not overfill.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wojcik

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It took almost a month to receive, but I knew that when I placed the order. In order to meet the requirements of our warranty, this is the type of fluid we have to use for our new diesel Fords.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Snell

customer_reviews.title: Check a Ford Dealer
customer_reviews.text: OEM part, but I would check other places for better price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great vendor
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised, Ford exhaust fluid for my Diesel engine. Shipping was excellent, prepared quickly and earlier than stated, which was very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: OEM DEF
customer_reviews.text: It was For DEF. It doesn't come with the nozzle, I bought it separately.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: No pour spout
customer_reviews.text: The price was good, but there was no pour spout included. This made using the product rather difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Akilah Jordan

customer_reviews.title: No spout
customer_reviews.text: Good def only draw back it didn't come with the snout to poor it in the truck
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very frustrating. Did not come with a nozzle as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gettys

customer_reviews.title: NOT SEALED PROPERLY
customer_reviews.text: NO SEAL UNDER CAP,i have a container that is little over 1/2 full.Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dudley R.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, went in fine - make sure you have ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, went in fine - make sure you have the Ford nozzle for pouring it in - one 2.5-gallon jug is enough to fill the DEF tank halfway.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C.

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is.. However, packaging ...
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is..However, packaging is much to be desired. Boxes to light of duty, thus smashed all to hell..
customer_reviews.author: Double D

customer_reviews.title: No spout included
customer_reviews.text: The price was good, but there was no pour spout included. This made using the product rather difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how to rate this. I guess I ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to rate this. I guess I will go with one star based solely on price. Unless you are hung up on paying much more for Motorcraft brand DEF, just find a big truck stop. They carry it by the 1 and 2.5 gallon containers with the nozzle. If your lucky, you will find a truck stop where you can just top off your DEF tank while you fill up with diesel. Some have installed DEF pumps right next to the diesel pumps. :)
customer_reviews.author: Benjamimah

customer_reviews.title: Priced much troo higfh
customer_reviews.text: Price is way too high compared to other brands that are about half the price and are rated just as high by the federal and commercial rating agencies.
customer_reviews.author: Loose Nut Ford Racing Team

customer_reviews.title: DEF FLUID BY FORD
customer_reviews.text: I MADE MY FIRST PURCHACE OF DEF FLUID FORD MOTOR CRAFT HERE ON AMAZON AND IT WAS THE OEM DEF FLUID AS REQUIRED BY FORD AND I AM HAPPY WITH MY PURCHACE
customer_reviews.author: james r.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product description
customer_reviews.text: The fluid is fine, but you can get it anywhere for a lot less. We specifically ordered this to get the special nozzle to keep from over filling. The product description leads you to believe it comes with the fluid. It doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Pate

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product I assume is fine what I did not understand was why it did ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product I assume is fine what I did not understand was why it did not fill the tank. Why would I not fill it if I am taking the time to pour it in?
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive. Ridiculous price.
customer_reviews.text: You'd be crazy to pay this price. I purchased the same product from an auto parts store for $13. Also, it doesn't come with the nozzle assembly.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

product_meta.title: Genuine Ford Fluid PM-27-JUG Diesel Exhaust Fluid - 2.5 Gallon
product_meta.description: Size:2.5 GallonDiesel Exhaust Fluid (DEF) is a new product required by many heavy-duty trucks, pickups, SUVs and vans delivered after January 2010. DEF is used to destroy harmful emissions in the exhaust and meet the EPA's latest strict environmental standards.
feature_bullets: Required for diesel vehicles equipped with a selective catalytic reduction (SCR) emissions after treatment system
Reduces NOx emissions in diesel vehicles with an SCR catalyst
AUS32 fluid meeting all the requirements and purity standards of ISO 22241 and DIN70071
Nozzle specifically designed to fit the DEF filler opening of 2011MY and forward Ford diesel vehicles (as well as many competitive vehicles) and prevent over filling the DEF tank
Use only dispensing systems that are compatible with DEF

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
